long_description: When you're climbing a snowy peak or winter camping in sub-zero temperatures, you want the Marmot 8000 Meter mittens with you to keep your fingers toasty. Ripstop nylon shells with Gore-Tex(R) Paclite(R) technology prevent moisture from getting in so your hands remain dry on snowy adventures. 700-fill-power goose down and Primaloft(R) insulation combine to keep your hands warm when the temperature plummets. Remove the down mittens when you don't need to the waterproof protection of the the shell mittens. Leather-reinforced palms provide a sure grip of ice axes, ski poles and ropes. Cinch down the wrist straps and gauntlet drawcords to keep snow and cold air out. Use the loops on the backs of the hands to hang the Marmot 8000 Meter mittens from your climbing harness with a carabiner (sold separately).
